00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_FUSION_CONTAINER_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_FUSION_CONTAINER_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/equal_to.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/mpl/if.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/mpl/minus.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/mpl/size.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/void.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/policy.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/link_holder.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/head_holder.hpp>
00029 
00030 namespace boost{
00031         struct use_default;
00032 namespace assign{
00033 namespace v2{
00034 namespace ref{
00035 namespace fusion_aux{
00036 
00037     template<std::size_t N, typename L,typename Tag1, typename Tag2, typename T>
00038         struct interface : boost::mpl::apply4<
00039         fusion_aux::policy<Tag2>,
00040         boost::mpl::int_<N>, L, Tag1, T
00041     >{};
00042 
00043     template<
00044         std::size_t N, typename L, typename Tag1, typename Tag2, typename T>
00045     class container 
00046         : public fusion_aux::link_holder<L, N == 0>,
00047         public fusion_aux::head_holder<Tag1, T, N == 0>,        
00048         public fusion_aux::interface<N, L, Tag1, Tag2, T>::type
00049     {
00050 
00051         typedef boost::mpl::int_<0> int0_;
00052         typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> int1_;
00053         typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> size_;
00054         typedef typename boost::mpl::minus<size_,int1_>::type index_;
00055         typedef Tag1 assign_tag_;
00056 
00057                 typedef typename fusion_aux::interface<
00058                 N, 
00059             L, 
00060             Tag1, 
00061             Tag2, 
00062             T
00063         >::type super_t;
00064 
00065                 typedef fusion_aux::link_holder<L, size_::value == 0> link_;
00066                 typedef fusion_aux::head_holder<Tag1, T, size_::value == 0> head_;
00067 
00068         public:
00069 
00070                 // -- used by most_const -- //
00071                 typedef T head_value_type;
00072         typedef L link_value_type;
00073 
00074                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00075         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(std::size_t, static_size = N);
00076         typedef typename boost::mpl::equal_to<size_,int0_>::type is_empty_;
00077 
00078         explicit container(){}
00079         explicit container(const L& l, T& h)
00080             : link_( l ),
00081             head_( h )
00082         {}
00083 
00084         template<typename NewL, typename NewTag2, typename U>
00085         explicit container(const container<N, NewL, Tag1, NewTag2, U>& that)
00086             :link_( that ), 
00087             head_( that ),
00088             super_t( that ){}
00089 
00090         // ------ operator() ----- //
00091                 //     adds an element     //
00092         // ----------------------- //
00093 
00094         template<typename T1>
00095         struct result{
00096             typedef container this_;
00097             typedef container<N+1, this_, Tag1, Tag2, T1> type;
00098         };
00099 
00100         template<typename T1>
00101         typename result<T1>::type
00102         operator()(T1& t)const{
00103                 typedef typename result<T1>::type result_;
00104                 return result_( *this, t );
00105         }
00106 
00107         template<typename T1>
00108         typename result<T1 const>::type
00109         operator()(T1 const& t)const{
00110                 typedef typename result<T1 const>::type result_;
00111                 return result_( *this, t );
00112         }
00113 
00114         // ---- static_lookup ---- //
00115 
00116         template<int I>
00117         struct is_head : boost::mpl::bool_< I + 1 == N >{};
00118 
00119         template<int I>
00120         struct link_result_static_lookup : L::template 
00121                 result_static_lookup<I>{};
00122 
00123                 template<int I>
00124                 struct result_static_lookup : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00125                 is_head<I>,
00126             boost::mpl::identity<T&>,
00127             link_result_static_lookup<I>
00128         >{};
00129 
00130                 // A template is needed even as the argument is known, to prevent
00131         // compiler errors for N = 0.
00132         template<int I>
00133         typename boost::lazy_enable_if<
00134                 is_head<I>,
00135                 result_static_lookup<I>
00136         >::type
00137         static_lookup(boost::mpl::int_<I> same_index)const
00138         {
00139                 return this->head.unwrap(); 
00140         }
00141 
00142         template<int I>
00143         typename boost::lazy_disable_if<
00144                 is_head<I>,
00145                 result_static_lookup<I>
00146         >::type
00147         static_lookup(boost::mpl::int_<I> smaller_index)const
00148         {
00149                 return this->link().static_lookup( smaller_index );
00150         }
00151 
00152     };
00153 
00154 }// fusion_aux
00155 }// ref
00156 }// v2
00157 }// assign
00158 }// boost
00159 
00160 #endif
